pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample code:: from datetime import datetime, timedelta now = datetime.now() hrago = now - timedelta(hours=1) yesterday = now - timedelta(days=1) tomorrow = now + timedelta(days=1) dayafter = now + timedelta(days=2) import pretty print pretty.date(now) # 'now' print pretty.date(hrago) # 'an hour ago' print pretty.date(hrago, short=True) # '1h ago' print pretty.date(hrago, asdays=True) # 'today' print pretty.date(yesterday, short=True) # 'yest' print pretty.date(tomorrow) # 'tomorrow'
